name: Drunk-Fu: Wasted Masters
detailed_description:
Drunk-Fu: Wasted Masters is all about high speed aerial drunken kung-fu! Flail your intoxicated ragdoll around in a wrecked rampage both online & offline. Howl in a drunken fury as you beat up your friends or AI controlled bullies in different arenas across the globe.

Master physics defying drunk-fu techniques by controlling your stumbling direction and unleashing powerful attacks with each individual limb. Team up with your friends to beat AI controlled bullies in the Swarm-mode or challenge each other in the Free for All or Last Man Standing modes to see who is the true Wasted Master.

NOTE: THE ONLINE GAMEPLAY IS STILL A WORK IN PROGRESS & MAY NOT WORK IN ALL SETUPS

Features in the current version:

  • Drunken kung-fu madness for up to 8 players
  • Three game modes: Free for All, Last Man Standing & Swarm
  • Six levels to crawl in: Irish pub, Kuja, Tikibar, Saloon, Diner & Midsommar
  • Melee weapons for bashing others around
  • Customizable outfits to show the world your impeccable taste
  • Online matchmaking

Features shipping later this year:

  • Bunch of new game modes: Capture the Barrel, King of the Jukebox, Slap the Swede etc.
  • Tutorial
  • Customizable controls
  • Tweaks to gameplay
  • New costumes
  • Complete Steamworks integration

short_description: Master physics defying drunk-fu techniques in Drunk-Fu: Wasted Masters - a ragdoll filled brawler. Flail your intoxicated ragdoll around in a multiplayer rampage both online & locally.
reviews:
“I am doing something. I am punching people.”
Markiplier

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: DualCore AMD/Intel 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 4850 / Nvidia 8800 GTS 512 Mb or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
